overview: International ultra runner and qualified lawyer, Dr. Sinead Kane is the first visually impaired athlete to complete 7 marathons on 7 continents in 7 days. FORERUNNER follows Sinead's extraordinary daily life as she examines her motivations and for the first time confronts the horrific bullying and hardships she experienced throughout her childhood.
tagline: World record holder. Visually impaired solicitor. Elite athlete. This is Sinead.
title: Forerunner
